flawed_nl_solution:
Teresa has 49 pencils because 14 + 35 = <<14+35=49>>49
Teresa gives away 42 pencils because 49 - 10 = <<49-10=42>>42
Each sibling gets 14 pencils because 42 / 3 = <<42/3=14>>14
#### 14

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 39, not 42. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
